"TONIGHT on Haunted  Times Magazine Radio... 
Current mood:  blessed
Category:  Dreams and the Supernatural 
Tonight, Christopher  Moon will talk about the Telephone to the Dead, 
including discussing how he  became the fortunate primary researcher of it since 
it's modern day inception,  his research into it and with it, and the 
controversy which stems from  it.

As an added bonus, guests will have the opportunity to call in and  attempt 
to contact loved ones on the other side through Chris and the Telephone  to 
the Dead.

As always, our show begins tonight at 9:00pm EST / 8:00pm  CST / 7:00pm MST 
/ 6:00pm PST on _www.blogtalkradio.com/hauntedtimesmagazine_ 
(http://www.msplinks.com/MDFodHRwOi8vd3d3LmJsb2d0YWxrcmFkaW8uY29tL2hhdW50ZWR0aW1lc21hZ2F6aW
5l) ."
